scripts.vault: npm run vault:config && npm run vault:start && echo "Vault server started. Unseal by running 'npm run vault:unseal', 'vault operator unseal' or in browser: $VAULT_ADDR"
scripts.vault:unseal: echo "You can also unseal in browser: $VAULT_ADDR" && vault operator unseal
scripts.start: npm run vault:login && npm run vault:generate:token && npm run vault:generate:wrap-token && npm run vault:logout && nightwatch && npm run cleanup && npm run chrome:zombies:kill
scripts.chrome:zombies: npm run chrome:zombies:find --silent || echo 'No zombie chromedrive processes found'
scripts.chrome:zombies:kill: npm run chrome:zombies && npm run chrome:zombies:find --silent | awk '{print $2}' | xargs kill && npm run chrome:zombies
